title: If you believe in Rebirth, is it possible to rebirth in the same family? - Quora

response.answer_text: it may or may not depends on ones karma and once state of mind as is said in bhagvat gita “yam yam vapi smarana bhava tykajante kale varama” but we cannot decide it ourselves as we are not independent to take birth we are forced to take birth in particular body in a particular family, even we dont remember which were our past family presently, so it is of no use to say that i want to take birth in this family only because my family is very affectionate to me because in next life same thing we will say about the family we will take birth in, and it may be same family and most probably different one
